# [Interview #75: ACOS Signing Report - Erica Sadun, Entry #35](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=75#35)

#### Question

Why doesn't somebody just balefire the Dark One?

#### Robert Jordan

The quantity necessary would destroy the world.
